title: Season One: Origin
description: First Season of the ULIC Monthly Event. Prizes for top 3 contestants. September-October 2025

title: Session 4: Deploying a Website
description: Learn the essentials of deploying a static website using modern tools like GitHub and Netlify. Go from local project to live on the web.

title: Session 3: Basics of Web Development
description: Your journey into web development starts here. We'll cover the foundational blocks: HTML, CSS, and a touch of JavaScript.

title: Build Your Portfolio!
description: A hands-on workshop where members get expert advice on showcasing their skills and building an impressive online portfolio.

title: First Online Session
description: Our first online session, also dubbed as Session Two. We covered club logistics and planned future activities.

title: First Session
description: Our inaugural in-person session where we introduced ULIC, its vision, and welcomed our founding members.

title: UCA Unveiled
description: The official launch of ULIC under the UCA banner, a milestone event for our entire community.
